mapper.select: select g.room_idx, g.user_idx, u.nickname, u.img from gameroom g, user u where g.user_idx = u.idx and room_idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into gameroom (room_idx, user_idx, role_idx) select #{room_idx}, #{user_idx}, "C" from dual where not exists(select user_idx from gameroom where user_idx=#{user_idx})
